paper.title: Tape bounds for time-bounded turing machines

author.org: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, MA, USA#TAB#

paper.venue: Journal of Computer and System Sciences
paper.abstract: Let L be a language recognized by a nondeterministic (single-tape) Turing machine of time complexity T(n)u003e=n^2. Then L is also recognized by a deterministic (single-tape) Turing machine of tape complexity T^1^/^2(n).
